did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: The Calendar Collection contains miscellaneous calendars used by unidentified Georgetown residents.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the G&B Cultural Center.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item Description, Date], Calendar Collection, [Item no., Box no.], G&B Cultural Center, Wilton, Conn.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: The earliest calendar in the Calendar Collection is an almanac dating to 1839, while the latest is a wall calendar dating to 1978.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: The Calendar Collection includes wall calendars, almanacs, and desk calendars. It features wall calendars produced for Georgetown businesses and businessmen, including the Connery Bros. Company and Peter Ladd.
